mapper.insert: insert into members (id, pw, name, birth, gender, phone, ad_postcode, ad_address, ad_detail, ad_extra, email) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{ad_postcode}, #{ad_address}, #{ad_detail}, #{ad_extra}, #{email})
insert into members (id, pw, name, phone) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from members where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email} where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from members where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select * from members order by regdate
